purpose: To parse documents uploaded by the user and analyze them for statistics.

sections.name: Statistics Found
sections.description: Output a list of all identified statistics in the document and provide a page reference for every statistic found.

sections.name: Data Tables Found
sections.description: Output a list of all identified data tables in the document and provide a page reference for every data table found.

sections.name: Automated Analysis
sections.description: Provide an assessment of whether any of the statistics found in the document were particularly noteworthy. If a statistic is deemed noteworthy, indicate why that assessment was reached.
